items.sentence: I\'m not going to tell Tom about what happened.
I\'m not pleased with the quality of your work.
Tom and Mary exchanged glances with each other.
Let\'s hope that we don\'t have to do it again.
There\'s nothing going on between Tom and Mary.
If you don\'t want to come, you don\'t have to.
If you don\'t want to stay, you don\'t have to.
The last time I saw Tom, he was on a stretcher.
The main character dies at the end of the book.
The man got mad when his wife called him names.
